title: (x) Bobbie Gentry's Greatest! album cover type - Buxom {Mike Y}
content:
ID the font that says GREATEST!.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bgg69.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084158/http:/typophile.com/files/bgg69.jpg) | 45.24 KB |

 [‹ (x) "San Fermin 1975 - Pamplona" poster - Zipper, Neil Bold {Patricia, Alexey, Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084158/http:/typophile.com/node/17644 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Surface Mag insert serif face - Plantin Schoolbook {Ken B} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084158/http:/typophile.com/node/17632 "Go to next forum topic")
author: macgyver

comments.content:
I’ve seen this by various names, but the digital version is [Buxom](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/buxom/) from URW and others. [It was called BabyFat Black in the Phil’s Photo book of film types.]

- Mike Yanega
